version_description:
New Features:
- Prediction Badgeâ„¢ (Period/Ovulation/Cycle Day/Due Date). See when the next Event occurs already on your Icon.
- Notifications for your next Period/Ovulation, Pill or Nuvaring
- Create your own Calendar Themes and include even a Background Photo
- Backup/Restore via MyDays Cloud Backup, Dropbox or PC
- Auto Backup Save/Load
- NuvaRing and other birth Control based on Insert/Remove after x Days
- Partneremail, eMail your Partner how u felt in the last days and whats coming next.
- Choose long touch to change data and short to see more infos of the day
- Disable Daily Options, for example for kids or when you don't like to come pregnant
- Track more than 20 Symptoms and remember your Breast Self examination
- Track when you had sex (protected/unprotected)
- See the possible gender your baby may be
- Track your Cervix position, openness, firmness & feeling
- Track OPK Results (negativ, fertile, peak/ovulation)
- Add the actual cycle day to the calendar days
- Disable the predictions for period or ovulation on the calendar
- Filter what you like to see in your History List (eg. only Data from 2014)
- Photo Memories for each Day
- Multi Language: EN, DE, ES, FR, IT, AR, RO, PL, PT, BG, HR, NL, CA, ZH

Fix:
- FullScreen Ad (CloseButton)

Important:
- To be sure you keep your data while update crash etc, make a manual backup before you update!

Added ability to save and display info for multiple sex sessions in a single day.
Fixed error where app could crash when uploading a photo.
General bug fixes, optimisations and improvements.

Chat moved to calendar screen.
Email required to set password.
Critical bug fixes.
Dropbox disabled (due to new version incompatibility).
General clean up.

Chat moved to calendar screen.
Email required to set password.
Critical bug fixes.
Dropbox disabled (due to new version incompatibility).
General clean up.
Re-enabled pregnancy notifications and icon badges.
